name: Horse Carriage 2016 Transport Simulator – Real City Horse Cart Driving Adventure
name_original: Horse Carriage 2016 Transport Simulator – Real City Horse Cart Driving Adventure
description:
Let’s revive the Victorian era of horse carriages, cart and royal chariot. This Horse Carriage Transport Driver brings you the realistic experience of driving the grand old horse-drawn vehicle in the city. Are you ready for some Horse driving game instead of horseback riding games? Drive the city horse buggy to the picking point and carry tourist, passengers and kids and drop them to their respective location like churches, museums, hospitals or schools. Enjoy the new virtual experience of in harness horse instead of back riding the jumpy racing horse.
Download this latest most trending horse buggy transport game of 2016 and enjoy the complete range of horse craft missions. These pferd carriages have been replaced by cars, motorbikes, transporter truck and trailers. Most caballo carts are found on horse farms and grazing grounds transporting hay to cattle and stables.

Game Features:
1) Become a virtual horse carriage driver.
2) Different Horse Buggies to Choose.
3) Amazing 3D City Environment
6) Use Joystick to move
7) Horse and buggy with complete detailing.

Coming soon: Night Horse carriage driving with snowy and rainy weather conditions.
